name: U232 Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel was very nice. I was pleasantly surprised since we had a good rate. Had a problem with AC, but they took care of it quickly. Front desk staff very helpful with questions, sight seeing suggestions, etc.
reviews.title: Great value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: When you reserve twin/double, they mean just that - 2 twin beds pushed together. So they have their own bedding, etc. Interesting for a couple.
reviews.title: Great Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: 1 1/2 block from Hospital/Clinic Metro station - very easy to access
reviews.title: Great hotel before cruise

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed for 2 nights and must say was pleasantly surprised. Large rooms, nice and clean. Nice bathroom with shower and bath and also english speaking staff so checking in and out is easy. For the price, you get a great stay in a convenient place. One train from Sagrada Familia and 2 from beach. 25 minutes walk from La Rambla.
reviews.title: Good value stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Had a great stay and would use them again.
reviews.title: Good sightseeing base

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: I really enjoyed staying in the U232 hotel. It was modern and cean. The staff were very helpful and the rooms were a good size and nicely decorated with black beams on the ceiling and a well equipped black marble bathroom (once you work out how to use the shower controls - one for water and one for temperature, not hot and cold like I first thought - but that could just be me being useless).
reviews.title: A great hotel in a quiet location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have stayed in Barcelona many times in the past and normally stayed down near the port or the Ramblas however this hotel was slightly out of the 'tourist' centre which I really enjoyed. There are some really nice bars and restaurants near by (my favourite was Maitea Taberna, it is a must if you are staying in this hotel, only 2 minutes walk and great food. Read the reviews on this site).
reviews.title: Good value!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Although I did walk to the Ramblas from the hotel one day I would probably recomend the metro if you want to get about without blisters. There is a stop only one minutes walk from the hotel (called Hospital Clinic) which will give you quick access to the whole city.
reviews.title: Classy, well-appointed hotel in quiet area.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Travel Tip: I would definitely recommend getting a T-10 ticket for the metro, it saves you a lot of money and makes travel so easy. As the name would suggest you get ten trips on bus or metro and can be used by more than one person (just leave it on the top of the barrier for your friend to use behind you). Every time you use the ticket it tells you on the display how many trips you still have left...
reviews.title: Very good hotel and adequate accomodation

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Spent one week at the U232 in late June. Room was in the back (courtyard) and very quiet. The room seemed clean but kind of hard to really tell with the dark and black tiles. AC worked great. Bed was very firm and not the most comfortable from my perspective. The hotel in 1 1/2 blocks away from a metro stop but since it's on the blue line, a switch is usually required to the red line and can be somewhat of a bummer after a long day of walking. This being said, the hotel is a great value compared to many others.
reviews.title: Great location and hotel!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed 3 days in in Barcelona U232 hotel with my wife between 3-6 August 2008. Hotel has very futuristic interior design. Rooms were clean, staff is friendly. There are many items with quality in the room like (shaving kit, liquid bath soap, shampoo etc.) Free wireless internet connection was enough fast. It's not in the heart of the city but hotel has a close underground station, it's not a big problem.
reviews.title: Very nice, clean hotel with good price

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled on business
reviews.text: The U232 is very well located, close to Avigunda Diagonal, one of the most important avenues in Barcelona.
reviews.title: Very confortable and a good value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled with friends
reviews.text: I have stayed many times there for business and personal trips.
reviews.title: Great service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms are very confortable, good beds (even if they are not the best) and very clean bathrooms.
reviews.title: Jolly good choice

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled with friends
reviews.text: My only negative comment is the quality of the food in the room service, I asked for a club sandwich and it was not very good, compared with the club sandwich that you can get in any international chain hotel. I can not say anything regarding breakfast or dinner since I have not eaten there.
reviews.title: surprisingly good

likes.disliked: — the suggested 50 euro charge to extend our checkout

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A really modern hotel about 30 minutes walk to Ramblas, metro at the bottom of the street. Airport bus drops of at the corner of Ave Roma 5 minutes walk to hotel. We found the decor dark and the room next door was still to be fitted out , only noise came from the busy road Ave. Urgell, try to get a room away from it or you will not get any sleep. Have stayed in much better 4 star hotels
reviews.title: Modern but dark

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2004
reviews.text: We stayed here during peak season, and at under 200 quid for 4 nights the price is fantastic for central Barcelona. Anywhere nearer to La Ramblas at that time of year costs an arm and a leg! It's a short walk to the tube station, a couple of stops and you are at La Ramblas. Tubes run til quite late, but after that taxis back to the hotel are reasonable.
reviews.title: Cheap and Cheerful
Perfect for a short stay
reviews.text: Stayed 2 nights prior to a cruise. Hotel a few metro stops from the centre but still near enough to walk to all the main sights. We had a triple room which overlooked the internal yard so there was no view but it was quiet. We also had two bathrooms which was an unexpected surprise, even though the room was not large. The decor is contemporary. Also, the roof terrace was a pleasant place to sit in the early evening with comfy loungers and sun beds. The area nearby felt safe at night, with many local restaurants and there were several cafes for breakfast which would be a cheaper option than the hotel breakfast. All in all absolutely fine for a few days stay.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Very late in getting this review completed as stayed here for a weekend Mid Sept 2010. Arrived at the Hotel very late after a flight delay but was made to feel very welcome and was very pleased with the service at check-in. The room was very well furnished and although compact was extremely comfortable. The room had a good size balcony which provided for a pleasant level of coolness into the room. Although the Hotel is small and slightly out from what is considered the main centre of Barcelona it is actually a pleasant and reasonably quick walk along to the Passeig de Gràcia. The hotel bar was slick and comfortable as was the breakfast area with a good breakfast selection. There are plenty of Deli and coffee bars nearby as an alternative to having breakfast at the Hotel. I tried to re-book this Hotel for Easter Weekend 2011 but it was full and I guess a popular choice. It is a little gem amongst the hundreds of hotels dotted across Barcelona and I will be looking to stay here on my next trip to Barcelona albeit if not full……. Highly Recommended.
reviews.title: Loved this little Boutique Hotel!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I booked this place based on the great reviews I have read on TripAdvisor, and we were extremely happy with this choice. The hotel is super modern, and very well appointed. The staff is very pleasant, speaks English well, and got us room as soon as we arrived (and we came early).
reviews.title: I love this place! This is what a 4-star hotel should be like!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Word of advice: I booked it on Expedia, and they only had an option for a room with 2 twin beds - I wanted a double/queen bed, and put that as a note in the booking, and we got a queen bed. Our room #102 was facing courtyard, and didn't have any view, since the balcony was facing a wall, but that didn't bother us, since we came to Barcelona to explore the city, and not hang out on the balcony.
reviews.title: perfect hotel,would stay again.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Overall, this was one of my favorite hotels that I've been too, and would definitely go back there again.
reviews.title: Great Experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had a wonderful stay at U232.
reviews.title: Love for Barcelona started from the hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The service was excellent, breakfast buffet plentiful, rooms quite big with very nice bathrooms and the view from our window - magnificent!
reviews.title: U R sure to love the U232 Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Also I loved the fact that the staff actually helped us reserve a table in a restaurant - we didn't even really ask, they offered very gladly!
reviews.title: Clean, Friendly and Great option for the money!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Definitely THE place to stay in Barcelona!
reviews.title: Would Recommend

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: PS: Very easy to get to everywhere since near Hospital Clinic metro stop so easy to go to the old town, Sagrada Familia etc. We loved every minute!
reviews.title: Loved thie U232! Great stay!

description: Hotel U232 is located within the shopping and business zone of Plaza Francesc Macià, nestled between Avenida Diagonal and Paseo de Gracia. Easily accessible from all parts of the city, the hotel is just steps away from notable sites like Hospital Clinic and Camp Nou.The hotel offers 102 fully equipped rooms, including triple and family rooms, and an exclusive Top Room with private terrace. U232 also offers guests access to two meeting rooms, a fitness center, business center with complimentary Internet access, and a peaceful terrace-solarium.
